pokerapp.scorer.scoredhands

Class AbstractScoredHand<T,U extends HandTypeTag>

  • Object
    • ScoredHand<U>
      • AbstractScoredHand<T,U>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<ScoredHand>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FlushScoredHand, FullHouseScoredHand, NoPairScoredHand, RunScoredHand, StraightFlushScoredHand, StraightScoredHand, TwoPairScoredHand

    public abstract class AbstractScoredHand<T,U extends HandTypeTag>
extends ScoredHand<U>
    Implements Coplien's Curiously Recurring Template Pattern to avoid issues with Java's lack of covariant parameter types.
    Author:
    Steve Faulmann
